name: Flappy Bat (itch) (maychku)
description:
Meet Eggo, a lost bat who got lured into a mysterious cave by shiny crystals, only to find out they're deadly.

Created during Art & Interaction course at Bezalel Academy of Arts and Design, guided by Dani Bacon and Rutu Modan.

CONTROLS

START or RESPAWN - left mouse-click

JUMP - spacebar / left mouse-click
